forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 9 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In the hushed hours of the night, clouds drape Downtown San Francisco in a gentle shroud, whispering promises of a new day yet to dawn. The air carries a refreshing chill, hinting at the cool embrace of the Pacific nearby. As morning breaks, the clouds will dissolve, giving way to a sunny disposition that lifts spirits and invites exploration. A comfortable high will nudge close to 65 degrees, though a subtle drop in temperature will accompany the afternoon, perhaps nudging you toward a mid-layer for comfort under the gusty breeze that sweeps in from the southwest.

The day’s clarity suggests a soft but vibrant palette, with visibility lending itself to splendid views across the Bay. The marine layer, typical of this coastal haven, lingers just at sea, creating a delicate contrast to the cityscape. Dressing thoughtfully—perhaps a light jacket layered over a t-shirt—will serve well, transitioning smoothly from a morning chill to midday sunshine. In this inviting atmosphere, consider meandering along the Embarcadero, relishing a warm cup of coffee while watching boats dance along the water’s edge. Alternatively, lose yourself in one of the local art galleries, experiencing the synergy of creativity and light that flourishes under the California sun.
